code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate,Link}from'react-router-dom';import{useAuth}from'./AuthContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LoginPage=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const{login}=useAuth();const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setLoading(true);setError('');try{await login(email,password);navigate('/');}catch(err){var _err$response,_err$response$data;setError(((_err$response=err.response)===null||_err$response===void 0?void 0:(_err$response$data=_err$response.data)===null||_err$response$data===void 0?void 0:_err$response$data.message)||'Login failed');}finally{setLoading(false);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Login"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{color:'red'},children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Email:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Password:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn",disabled:loading,children:loading?'Logging in...':'Login'})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Don't have an account?
